item.title: Let's Learn Apache Drill Together
item.description: Lets Learn Apache Drill Together! Querying cvs Files with Headers Default behavior is to ignore the first line and not use headers. You can change this by going to the storage tab in the web interface Text Files: CSV, TSV, PSV - Apache Drill Using COLUMNS[x] instead of columns[x] Query Failed: An Error Occurred org.apache.drill.common.exceptions.UserRemoteException: DATA_READ ERROR: Selected column ‘COLUMNS’ must have name ‘columns’ or must be plain ‘*’ File Path file:_sample-data_some.
